verses.name: Psalms 90:1
verses.text: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.

verses.name: Psalms 90:2
verses.text: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.

verses.name: Psalms 90:3
verses.text: Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.

verses.name: Psalms 90:4
verses.text: For a thousand years in thy sight are but as yesterday when it is past, and as a watch in the night.

verses.name: Psalms 90:5
verses.text: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up.

verses.name: Psalms 90:6
verses.text: In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.

verses.name: Psalms 90:7
verses.text: For we are consumed by thine anger, and by thy wrath are we troubled.

verses.name: Psalms 90:8
verses.text: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.

verses.name: Psalms 90:9
verses.text: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale that is told.

verses.name: Psalms 90:10
verses.text: The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.

verses.name: Psalms 90:11
verses.text: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.

verses.name: Psalms 90:12
verses.text: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.

verses.name: Psalms 90:13
verses.text: Return, O Lord, how long? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants.

verses.name: Psalms 90:14
verses.text: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.

verses.name: Psalms 90:15
verses.text: Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us, and the years wherein we have seen evil.

verses.name: Psalms 90:16
verses.text: Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.

verses.name: Psalms 90:17
verses.text: And let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.
